# Descriptive analyses {#descriptive-analyses}

#### How to perform descriptive analyses and create graphs in jamovi: {-}

1. Select `Analyses` -> `Exploration` -> `Descriptives`.  
<img src="images/select/select_descriptives.JPG" width="60%"/> 

2. Drag and drop the variables you want descriptive analyses for to __Variables__.  
<img src="images/add_var/add_var_descriptives.JPG" width="70%"/> 

3. The result is shown in the right panel. Right click the output to save or copy it.
<img src="images/output/output_descriptives1.JPG" width="40%"/>

4. To split your descriptive analyses on a categorical variable (e.g. to separate by gender), move that variable to __Split by__.

5. Click the __Statistics__ tab to see more alternatives.
<img src="images/select/select_descriptives_statistics.JPG" width="60%"/> 

6. To create a plot based on the above choices, click the __Plots__ tab and tick the box of your desired plot.  
<img src="images/select/select_descriptives_plots.JPG" width="60%"/>
